title: Turkey Red PSA 5 Camnitz for sale or trade
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Turkey Red PSA 5 Camnitz for sale or trade
posts.post_content: Offered here is a very nice example of a Turkey Red graded a PSA 5 . The player is Howie Camnitz who was a star pitcher for the early Pittsburgh teams with Honus Wagner. I am looking for 600.00  . Plus 20.00 for shipping and insurance packaged nicely in a secure box. I am also open to trade for other pre 1920 vintage in high grade.
